name: Dig (paulio)
description:
Dig is a game made for WWU Game Design club's second game jam.

Bethany-Lynn Rodriguez: Art and design

Steven Velador: Programming, design, and art

Paul Von Zimmerman: Programming and design

You can find source at: https://github.com/pcvonz/dig

Controls:

Player 1:

F: Jump

Space: Throw bomb (hold for bomb delay)

Player 2:

Up arrow: Jump
Down arrow: Throw bomb (hold for bomb delay)
